entry.summary: State Senator David Brock Smith is live from Salem with an update on the pause in the Special Session of the Oregon State Legislature

entry.title: Roseburg Man Faces New Sex Abuse Charges Following Prior Conviction
entry.summary: Jerry Lee Thacker, 58, of Roseburg, already convicted of sex crimes against a minor, was arraigned on 15 new counts involving another alleged victim over more than a decade. He waived his right to a speedy trial and remains in custody.

entry.title: Myrtle Creek Woman Arraigned Following Child Injury Incident
entry.summary: Kati Ann Steensland, 31, of Myrtle Creek, was arraigned after a child was injured in Canyonville when her pickup reportedly ran over the child’s arm. She faces multiple misdemeanor charges and one felony hit-and-run charge. Bail was set at $10,000.

entry.title: Traveling Museum of Natural and Cultural History exhibit comes to Sutherlin Library
entry.summary: SUTHERLIN — Where did the world’s oldest shoes come from? How do you make a canoe not tip over? What are Camas bulbs? What’s a herring rake? How do you build an earth oven?

entry.title: More charges for child rapist
entry.summary: A Roseburg man who just last month was convicted of raping a 13-year-old girl was in court again Tuesday, this time to face charges alleging he sexually abused another girl over the span of more than a decade.

entry.title: Fremont Middle School students welcomed with WEB leaders
entry.summary: Schools are back in session all across the U.S. and Roseburg is no different, opening doors in all of its schools Tuesday to welcome in students for the 2025-26 school year.

entry.title: Dad’s Creek Fire Prompts Road Closure and Evacuation Notice Near Glendale
entry.summary: Dad’s Creek Fire near Glendale has burned 130 acres, prompting road closures on Cow Creek Rd. Level 1 “Be Ready” evacuations are in effect for 30482–31302 Lower Cow Creek Rd. Crews have 60% containment. Stay alert, check dcso.com/evacuations.
